traits.name: Мудрість
traits.description: Deep understanding of the world, philosophical reflections

traits.name: Пізнання
traits.description: Preservation of knowledge and experience, attention to history

traits.name: Марнославство
traits.description: Arrogance, desire to be the center of attention

traits.name: Жадібність
traits.description: Desire for wealth and material gain

traits.name: Розпусність
traits.description: Pursuit of pleasures, temptations, neglect of duties
